TextView.android:text: Let's See how's your studies going on
Hurray! The following are your strengths and you did well in the below topics. Just keep revising
Hey ! Focus on these chapters to cross the boundary for success.
Hey! You should finish the below topics to stand out of the crowd. Learn more & focus on your weaknesses
The more you ask, The more you learn.
Doubts in your mind appears with a pause. You learn concepts when you are curious to ask your doubts.
Let's see how focused you are while learning.
I smile with a green face when you focus and understand the concepts.
